name: Broccoli the Great Telling
description:
In the city of Healtholis lived a young child who has been chosen to save the world.  In his vision Applecartis selected this young child for the great journey.  Broccoli, the child must traverse the dangerous path to find the Golden marshmallow.

Help Broccoli jump from marshmallow to marshmallow until you reach the Golden marshmallow. If Broccoli falls, you lose and the world will be in trouble.

Use space bar to jump
Use right and left arrow keys to move left and right

Use the physics to your advantage by making jumps from platform to platform. Use the level gimmicks to your advantage. Pink marshmallow create automatic jumps. Use the wider marshmallow platforms for more room to bounce or for a bigger run before you jump.  Make your way to the Golden marshmallow to win.  Fall off the platform and you lose!

That's all. Enjoy!
